document.description: Serving Fruits, Vegetables, Nuts and Seeds Sample Menu Choices based on availability of fresh produce and chef's whim! Organic as available
document.body:
Serving Fruits, Vegetables, Nuts and Seeds
Sample Menu Choices based on availability of fresh produce and chef's whim! Organic as available
Beverages Young Thai Coconut Water Young Florida Coconut Water Pressed Sugar Cane Juice Pressed Fruit Juices du jour Pressed Vegetable Juices du jour Pressed Tropical Fruit Juices du jour Nut&Seed Milks du jour Orange and Grapefruit Juices Agave Lemonade Warm Lemon Ginger or Mint tea Warm Coconut Chai Bonobo's Water
Blends Fruit blend coconut water and choice of 1-3 ingredients: banana·strawberry·blueberry·pineapple· orange·grape·melon·fruit du jour· young coconut meat·carob·nut butter Agave Nectar--free!
Banana Coconut Cream Bonobo's Blend
Tapas assorted du jour
Soups
Gazpacho Carrot Ginger Spinach Avocado Sesame Cucumber
Warm Soups: Winter Veggie Minestrone Vegetable Pureé (warm soups not heated above 118°F)
Soups du jour Thai Coconut Soup served in coconut
Salads organic as available
Mesclun Baby Spinach Chopped Romaine Greens du Jour Herb Mixed Greens
tomato celery cucumber carrot red pepper zucchini broccoli cauliflower red cabbage red onion avocado green onion sprouts du jour fennel jicama celeriac daikon raw pickles pumpkin seeds sunflower seeds sundried tomato sunripe olives
mixed fruit salad seasonal specialties salad specialties du jour
Organic Dressings Lemon Garlic Tahini Citrus Vinaigrette Berry Vinaigrette Thai Coconut Tomato Basil Carrot Ginger Green Pesto Red Pesto Seed/Nut Dressings Italian French Avocado Assorted Dressings du Jour
Premium Bariani Olive Oil Organic Raw Sesame Oil Raw Live Coconut Oil Organic Raw Pumpkin Seed Oil Organic Raw Flax Oil Raw Avocado Horopito Oil with Lemon, Lime, Orange or Sour Orange juices
Scoops delicious on salads small scoop large scoop
Organic Mixed Veggie Nut Pate Organic Curried Almond Pate Organic Italian Herb Pate Thai Pate Organic Almond-Sesame Hummus Pate du Jour Scoop du jour Nut&Seed Mousses Guacamole Salad Assorted Nut&Seed Salads
Organic Seed/Nut Crackers, Crisps&Wafers assorted
Entrees Lasagna of organic fresh veggies layered with nut pate and fresh tomato sauce Fresh Entrees du jour, served with salad
Sweets organic as available
assorted nut-crusted Fruit Pies assorted Puddings Bonobo's Frozen Fudge Bonobo's assorted Candies Frozen Mesquite Nut Banana assorted Spectacular Fruit&Nut Sinless IceCreams/Sorbets Bonobo's Carob/Mesquite Coconut Banana Split Mixed Fruit Ambrosia du jour with Fresh Coconut
